text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's Rice Shower! Rice Shower did not<n>back down! An
excellent finish in first!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the Tenno Sho right around the<n>corner, Rice runs like
her old self again<n>at the Nikkei Sho.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And as if galvanized by that<n>performance, McQueen takes
the<n>Osaka Hai in course-record time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They've both been training harder<n>than ever, pushing each
other to<n>greater heights.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And before long, the day of the Tenno<n>Sho arrives.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In bracket two, post three, it's the<n>sable stayer who denied
Mihono<n>Bourbon her Triple Crown—Rice<n>Shower!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just follow McQueen... Just keep<n>following...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unfazed by the huge crowd before<n>her, Rice fixes her gaze
on McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She wants to win against her rival<n>more than anything else.
Her eyes are<n>telling me so.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Meanwhile, the crowd favorite is, of<n>course...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In bracket eight, post fourteen,<n>today's favorite with a third
straight<n>spring Tenno Sho on the line, it's the<n>queen
herself—Mejiro McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The loudest fanfare of the day<n>resounds for her, but
McQueen<n>doesn't seem to hear.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Like her rival, she's focused on one<n>thing, and one thing
only—victory.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The crowd's excited to see you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer. Shouldn't you be going to<n>check up on Rice?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'm your trainer too, you know.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Heh. And I'm lucky to have such an<n>exemplary one. But
please, go see<n>how she's doing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
After all that training, I'm sure she's<n>built up enough
confidence, but she<n>must still be feeling anxious.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'm lucky to have such anexemplary ace on my team. Alwayslooking out for others, even a rival.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'm lucky to have such anexemplary ace on my team. Alwayslooking out for others, even a rival.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For now, yes. Out on the turf, I can't<n>make any guarantees.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will put everything I have into this<n>race. No holding back.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The crowd are hoping to witness the<n>birth of a three-time
Tenno Sho<n>champion. And their hopes give me<n>strength.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will be the first to cross thatfinish line.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't detect a single trace of<n>hesitation in her eyes. She
means<n>every word.
choice_data_list: Well, you can add my hopes in there as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Of course. I won't disappoint.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After speaking with McQueen, I jog<n>ahead to Rice Shower.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Nervous? The trick is to write<n>"Umamusume" on your palm
and<n>swallow the word three times.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Nervous? The trick is to write<n>"Umamusume" on your palm
and<n>swallow the word three times.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heheheh. I've never heard that<n>before.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm not that nervous, actually. It's<n>just... I'm a bit scared.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
So many people are rooting for<n>McQueen. I know how much
they<n>want to see her third Tenno Sho win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
If I win, they'll all be disappointed.<n>They'll be angry with me
for getting in<n>the way.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
The fact you're worried about that<n>tells me you're here to
win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah. I still want to win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her expression reminds me of<n>McQueen just now. Pure<n>
determination.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You know, it was McQueen who<n>suggested I have you race
in the<n>Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You know, it was McQueen who<n>suggested I have you race
in the<n>Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, she wants to show you<n>something—a sight only
a fellow<n>runner can see.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, she wants to show you<n>something—a sight only
a fellow<n>runner can see.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: There's a... "sight" she wants me to<n>see?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Okay. I'll see it for myself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mm. I will, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're lining up in the gate. The<n>spring Tenno Sho—who
will the glory<n>go to?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Just follow McQueen... Keep<n>following... Just follow
McQueen...<n>Keep following...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
(Well I'll be... Wasn't expecting to<n>feel so much pressure
from Rice.)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and here's the favorite, three-time<n>hopeful Mejiro
McQueen showing<n>hesitation before the gate.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
(Still, I am a Mejiro, and our team's<n>ace. I must run with
everything I<n>have.)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: There we go, Mejiro McQueen is in<n>the gate.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The spring Tenno Sho. Glory is 3,200<n>meters away. And...
they're off!
